an3.43:4.1: “Tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
an3.43:4.3: Yo dhammaṃ deseti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
an3.43:4.4: Yo dhammaṃ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
an3.43:4.5: Yo ceva dhammaṃ deseti yo ca dhammaṃ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṃvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṃvedino ca.
an3.43:4.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetun”ti.
